sentences.en: As much as I love my job as a newspaper reporter, I will never work myself into the ground, literally or figuratively.
sentences.cn: 尽管我热爱我的工作——报社记者，但我绝不会让自己因为工作把自己送入“坟墓”里面，不管是字面上还是比喻。

sentences.en: At times , both hands are figuratively tied behind my back.
sentences.cn: 我时常会觉得双手被束缚在背后.

sentences.en: Employees will be, figuratively speaking, in the driver's seat.
sentences.cn: 打个比方,雇员将会坐在驾驶座上, 即取得主动权.

sentences.en: English speakers like to use the word neck figuratively.
sentences.cn: 英国人喜欢用“颈”字作比喻.

sentences.en: Europe, with Germany literally and figuratively at its centre, is still at the start of a remarkable transformation.
sentences.cn: 以德国作为地理以及比喻意义上的中心的欧洲仍处于巨大变革的初期。

sentences.en: Figuratively, he could not kiss the hand that smote him.
sentences.cn: 打个比方说, 他是不能认敌为友.

sentences.en: I know I'll spend time in Tennessee and mend some fences, literally and figuratively.
sentences.cn: 我也会在家乡田纳西州修补一下篱笆 -- 真实的和象征的篱笆.

sentences.en: Notice in this sentence the word is used figuratively a transferred sense.
sentences.cn: 注意在这个句子中这个词是转义.

sentences.en: The upfront work is the secret to a million - dollar business and figuratively.
sentences.cn: 这是渐渐变成拥有百万资产的大企业的秘密.

sentences.en: The word in the sentence is used figuratively or in a transferred sense.
sentences.cn: 这个词在句子中是转义.

sentences.en: The word is used figuratively in the context.
sentences.cn: 这字在此上下文中做比喻用.
